name: VLC Launcher

screenshots.caption: 01 Browsing media (And Playing) choosing japanese interface
05 Sharpness tab (ver. 0.3.0.0 - tab hue renamed in 0.3.1.0)

short_description:
Interface for run videos with vlc media player with some options as hue settings for seeing color management in indipendent mode of video quality and before loading. In user temp folder create custom vlc config, run selected video. Requ. VLC. MP
==IMPORTANT==
Last version is written and tested for VLC 2.0.8 Twoflower. I strongly reccomend using custom vlc.exe path setting for testing others vlc versions: you can save settings for each video including custom vlc path in multiple version installations. By default vlclauncher try retrieve last installation path from O.S. registry. 
Nov.21.2013
VLCLauncher don't work with vlc 2.1.0-2.1.1 (impossible to set) for -height and -language commands: "Rincewind" named version can't lauch choosing custom qt interface language. Custom hight video will be set only if try use clone filter after lauching, really appear that videos was suddenly resized not according command setting but internally option works properly.
